title: Worse than Clinton
author: VD
content_html:
From the Washington Times:

U.S. Border Patrol agents have been ordered not to arrest illegal aliens along the section of the Arizona border where protesters patrolled last month because an increase in apprehensions there would prove the effectiveness of Minuteman volunteers, The Washington Times has learned.

More than a dozen agents, all of whom asked not to be identified for fear of retribution, said orders relayed by Border Patrol supervisors at the Naco, Ariz., station made it clear that arrests were “not to go up” along the 23-mile section of border that the volunteers monitored to protest illegal immigration.

We wouldn’t want to make those “vigilantes” look good now, would we. The government won’t do the few things it can and should do, like enforce national borders, as well as private parties. Why in the deep, dark, unholy name of slumbering Cthulhu would you put any faith in it doing anything else properly?
content_text:
From the Washington Times:
U.S. Border Patrol agents have been ordered
not to arrest illegal aliens
along the section of the Arizona border where protesters patrolled last month because an increase in apprehensions there would prove the effectiveness of Minuteman volunteers, The Washington Times has learned.
More than a dozen agents, all of whom asked not to be identified for fear of retribution, said orders relayed by Border Patrol supervisors at the Naco, Ariz., station made it clear that arrests were “not to go up” along the 23-mile section of border that the volunteers monitored to protest illegal immigration.
We wouldn’t want to make those “vigilantes” look good now, would we.  The government won’t do the few things it can and should do, like enforce national borders, as well as private parties.  Why in the deep, dark, unholy name of slumbering Cthulhu would you put any faith in it doing anything else properly?
